feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 09 Aug 2023 17:44:56
entry.summary:
SEC chairman warns AI could be at the heart of future financial crises

- The chairman of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has issued a warning about the potential risks of artificial intelligence (AI) in the financial industry.
- He expressed concerns that AI algorithms could amplify market volatility and contribute to future financial crises.
- The SEC is currently working on regulations to address the risks associated with AI in the financial sector.

Mega Millions drawing tonight

- There is a Mega Millions lottery drawing scheduled for tonight.
- Participants have a chance to win a large cash prize.

Protein Loss Linked to Growth Defects in Mice, Humans - Mirage News

- A study has found a link between protein loss and growth defects in both mice and humans.
- The research suggests that protein loss may play a role in stunted growth and developmental abnormalities.
- Further studies are needed to understand the underlying mechanisms and potential therapeutic interventions.

Student-loan payments and steeper interest rates will pave way for a severe consumer-led recession, top economist David Rosenberg says

- Prominent economist David Rosenberg predicts that the combination of student loan payments and higher interest rates will lead to a severe recession driven by consumer spending.
- He warns that the burden of student debt and rising borrowing costs will significantly impact consumer finances and ultimately the overall economy.

Mark Zuckerberg, wife Priscilla's relationship timeline, from dating to marriage

- A timeline of the relationship between Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg and his wife Priscilla is provided.
- It highlights key milestones from their dating years to their marriage.

Quote Post Maker

- There is a tool called Quote Post Maker that allows users to create visually appealing quote posts.
- This tool can be used to enhance social media posts or other forms of content.

Lofi & Jazz Hip Hop Producing Handbook

- The Lofi & Jazz Hip Hop Producing Handbook is a resource for music producers interested in creating lofi and jazz-inspired hip hop beats.
- It provides tips, techniques, and insights into the production process.

Minimalist eCommerce

- The concept of minimalist eCommerce is discussed.
- It refers to a streamlined and simplified approach to online retail, focusing on essential elements and removing unnecessary clutter.

Review My Design

- A request is made for a design review.
- The specific design or project is not specified, but the person is seeking feedback and critique.

Backendless

- Backendless is mentioned, but no further information is provided about its context or purpose.

Reflecting on My Failure to Build a Billion-Dollar Company (2019)

- The author reflects on their failure to build a billion-dollar company in 2019.
- They share their insights and lessons learned from the experience.

Amazon has more than half of all Arm server CPUs in the world

- Amazon is reported to have the majority share of Arm server CPUs globally.
- This indicates their dominance in the market for these types of processors.

Llama from Scratch (or how to implement a paper without crying)

- The content discusses the process of implementing a research paper from scratch, using the example of a paper about llamas.
- It emphasizes the challenges and frustrations that may arise during the implementation process.

Preserving endangered species' genes for the future: National Institute for Environmental Studies seeks funding for "time capsule"

- The National Institute for Environmental Studies is seeking funding through crowdfunding for a "time capsule" project.
- The project aims to preserve the genes of endangered species for future generations.

Completing tedious operations in one sentence: 8 Windows command-line tools you can try

- The content highlights eight Windows command-line tools that can simplify and streamline various operations.
- It suggests using these tools to accomplish tasks more efficiently.

HAS AI BECOME TOO HUMAN? Researchers At Google AI Find LLMs Can Now Use ML Models And APIs With Just Tool Documentation!

- Researchers at Google AI have discovered that large language models (LLMs) can now utilize machine learning models and APIs with just tool documentation.
- This suggests that AI has become more human-like in its ability to understand and utilize tools.

Pretiosum Ventures hits first close on its second fund to back infrastructure startups

- Pretiosum Ventures has achieved its first close on its second fund, which aims to support infrastructure startups.
- The fund will provide financial backing and resources to help these startups grow and succeed.

How to get more suggestions from GitHub Copilot

- The content provides tips and strategies for obtaining more suggestions from GitHub Copilot, an AI-powered coding assistant.
- It suggests techniques such as providing more context and using specific prompts to improve the quality and relevance of suggestions.

Cloud Providers Showdown: AWS vs. Azure vs. Google Cloud

- A comparison is made between the top cloud providers, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud.
- The content discusses their respective features, capabilities, and strengths, helping readers make informed decisions.

Weekly web development resources #161

- A compilation of web development resources is provided, specifically for the 161st week.
- It includes articles, tutorials, tools, and other useful content for web developers.

An Introduction to CSS: Customizing with index.css and Classes

- The content serves as an introduction to CSS, focusing on customizing web pages using index.css and classes.
- It provides basic information and examples to help beginners understand and apply CSS styling.

Everyone was wrong about antipsychotics

- The content challenges the conventional understanding and use of antipsychotic medications.
- It suggests that the prevailing beliefs about their effectiveness and safety may be incorrect.

People-centered startups: making employees happy is a key ingredient to success

- The content highlights the importance of prioritizing employee happiness in startups.
- It argues that creating a people-centered culture is a crucial factor in achieving success.

Kangmei Pharmaceutical: Company operations are normal, rumors of "two-month company vacation" are false

- Kangmei Pharmaceutical reassures that its operations are normal and dismisses rumors of a "two-month company vacation" as false.
- The company aims to clarify any misinformation and maintain transparency.

Tianli Lithium Energy: Signs strategic cooperation framework agreement with Penghui Energy

- Tianli Lithium Energy has signed a strategic cooperation framework agreement with Penghui Energy.
- The agreement outlines their collaboration in the lithium energy sector.

Australian Broadcasting Corporation withdraws from X, citing increasing prevalence of "harmful interactions" on the platform

- The Australian Broadcasting Corporation has decided to withdraw from X, citing the growing prevalence of "harmful interactions" on the platform.
- The decision reflects concerns about the negative impact of such interactions.

Another UK property developer announces layoffs due to high interest rates suppressing new home demand

- Another property developer in the UK has announced layoffs, attributing them to the impact of high interest rates on new home demand.
- The company is facing challenges in the housing market due to the financial constraints imposed by higher borrowing costs.

China Unicom: Net profit of 5.44 billion yuan in the first half of the year, a year-on-year increase of 13.7%

- China Unicom reports a net profit of 5.44 billion yuan in the first half of the year, representing a 13.7% year-on-year increase.
- The company's financial performance indicates growth and positive momentum.

Wall Street financial institutions collectively fined over $2.5 billion for using unofficial communication software for business purposes

- Wall Street financial institutions have been collectively fined over $2.5 billion for using unofficial communication software for business purposes.
- This highlights the regulatory scrutiny and penalties imposed on firms for non-compliance with official communication channels.

Hang Seng Index rises 0.32%, Hang Seng Tech Index falls 0.01%

- The Hang Seng Index has increased by 0.32%, while the Hang Seng Tech Index has fallen by 0.01%.
- The performance of these indices reflects the overall market trends and investor sentiment.
